name: XMLTV Producer for PHP
short_description: XmlTvProducer for PHP is extendable engine to grab tv/radio listings from websites and produce XMLTV output. Data distribution for TV-Browser is included. Primary focus is on Slovak and Czech channels, but the development is open to anybody.
